Time Series Analysis

Time Series Analysis¶

class clif.fourieranalysis.FourierTimeSeriesAnalysis(base_unit='year')[source]¶

Fourier analysis of time series

Parameters
base_unit: {‘day’, ‘month’, ‘year’}, default=’month’

base unit used to calculate the sampling rate and frequency

Examples

>>>fourier = FourierTimeSeriesAnalysis(base_unit=”month”) >>>fourier.fit(data=Ts) >>>fourier.plot_power_spectrum(xaxis=”period”) >>>y_filtered = fourier.transform(period_cutoff=1.1)
